q: It's official, as you can tell from the beaming faces of Stephen Elop and Steve Ballmer , the two companies have entered into a "broad strategic" partnership that will see the world's largest phone-maker adopt Windows Phone as its primary smartphone strategy. Larry is more the archetype of founder, innovator, hacker, inventor, interested in all of the magical things that digital technologies do. But others say that Mr. Eric Schmidt 's two biggest job responsibilities- being the public face of the company and managing internal politics- are areas where Mr. Page has less experience.

Former Donald Rumsfeld of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama . "He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure," Colin Powell said on NBC's "Meet the Press." Barack Obama displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. He has a definitive way of doing business that will do us well, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible presidential candidate himself.
